Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Class to control and manage the game
Author:
Stefano Fossati

      manage and control if the player has chosen the initial resources
      Returns:
      the array with the players that hasn't already chosen the initial resources

      set the number of playing players
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - how many players are going to play

    • startMatch

      public void startMatch() throws StartGameException
      start the match creating lorenzo if is a singleplayer game
      Throws:
      StartGameException - if there's any problem in starting game

    • newTurn

      public void newTurn​(boolean nextPlayer)
      check if the game is ended and send a new turn event to clients
      Parameters:
      nextPlayer - specify if the controller has to pass the turn to a new player

    • initialResourcesChoose

      public void initialResourcesChoose​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> initialDepositState, java.lang.String playerName)
      put the initial resources choice in player's deposit
      Parameters:
      initialDepositState - the state of the initial deposit
      playerName - the name of the player

    • discardInitialLeaderCards

      public void discardInitialLeaderCards​(java.lang.String playerName, int leaderCard1, int leaderCard2)
      discard two initial leader-cards from the started four
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player who's discarding the leaders
      leaderCard1 - the first leader to discard
      leaderCard2 - the second leader to discard

    • leaderCardTurn

      public void leaderCardTurn​(java.lang.String playerName, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> actions, boolean isFinal)
      start the leader card turn
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player who's playing
      actions - the action for each leader in order respect to the available ones
      isFinal - if is the end of the turn

    • marketChooseLine

      public void marketChooseLine​(java.lang.String namePlayer, int line, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> leaderMarketWhiteChange)
      Parameters:
      namePlayer - the player who's playing the turn
      line - the line to choice from the market
      leaderMarketWhiteChange - the leader white-change to use, the position in the array specify the leader to use in order respect on active leaders

    • saveNewDepositState

      public void saveNewDepositState​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> newDepositState, int discardResources, boolean isAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalDepositState)

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard​(int color, int level)
      start the turn buy-development-card
      Parameters:
      color - color of the development to buy
      level - level of the development to buy

    • spaceDevelopmentCard

      public void spaceDevelopmentCard​(int space)
      Put a bought development card in an available space
      Parameters:
      space - the space where to put the bought card

    • activateProduction

      public void activateProduction​(boolean useBaseProduction, Resource resourceRequested1, Resource resourceRequested2, ProductedMaterials resourceGranted, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> useLeaders, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> materialLeaders, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> useDevelop, java.lang.String playerName)
      Parameters:
      useBaseProduction - boolean that specify if the player want to use the base production
      resourceRequested1 - if the player want to use the base production indicates the first resource to use to develop
      resourceRequested2 - if the player want to use the base production indicates the second resource to use to develop
      resourceGranted - if the player want to use the base production indicates resource granted from the base production
      useLeaders - Array of Boolean that specify if the player want to use leaders productions, the boolean is in the same * position of the leader the player want to use
      materialLeaders - The material the player want from the leader production, the resource is in the same * * position of the leader the player want to use
      useDevelop - Array of Boolean that specify if the player want to use a production card, the boolean is in the same * * position of the production card the player want to use
      playerName - the player who has chosen the development turn

    • controlPlayerPath

      public void controlPlayerPath​(int numPlayer, int section)
      control the other player's path if a player go on a pope-space
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - the player who activate the pope-space
      section - the section in which the pope-space has been activated

    • turnToView

      public void turnToView()
      send to each player the current status of the match

    • checkMultiplayer

      public boolean checkMultiplayer()
      if a player is playing a match in single-game do lorenzo turn and return false otherwise return true
      Returns:
      true if there are more than one player
